tei:transcription.tei:p: [top-left, picture, captioned: Baden b. Wien, Niederösterr.]
[An:] H. Prof. [/] Felix v. Cube Duisburg, (Rhld) Pulverweg [/] 41

Danke für Briefchen u. Bild! S had supplied C with two copies of Victor Hammer’s mezzotint portrait of S, one of which was displayed in the exhibit in the Scheuermann bookshop in Duisburg in June 1924 for S’s 60th birthday (OJ 9/34, [13], July 6, 1928). S had told C to keep one for himself, and asked for “the second Hammer portrait” to be sent to him in Vienna in October (vC 17, July 13, 1928) and C dispatched it on October 4 (OJ 9/34, [14]). Wenn Sie nach Köln kommen, so besuchen Sie die Eltern meines Schülers aus Köln, der das 3^te^ Jahr hier bei mir studiert: H. Sanitätsrat Dr Albersheim: Gerhard Albersheim [create biogfile and link] was a pupil of Schenker’s in the late 1920s. An early essay, “Heinrich Schenker: Grundlagen und Bedeutung seines Werkes,” was written with his teacher’s help and published in the Rheinisches Theater- und Musik-Zeitung in 1930. The original draft is preserved as OC B/112-134, and copies of the published article as OC B/135 and OJ 21/23. sie werden sich gewiß sehr freuen, einen Kollegen ihres[corr] Sohnes bei sich zu begrüßen. Desgleichen stöbern Sie im Opernhause den Kapellm. Felix Hupka auf, der auch bei mir war. Beste Grüße von mir und meiner Frau
Mitte Okt. kommt Vrieslander nach Wien zu Hoboken. Click on Otto Vrieslander. Click on Anthony van Hoboken.
[along the left side:] Grüßen Sie H. u. Frau Albersheim [one illegible line]

tei:p.tei:hi: Handwritten postcard from Schenker to Cube, dated October 8, 1928

tei:translation.tei:p: [top-left, picture, captioned: Baden b. Wien, Niederösterr.]
[To:] Prof. Felix v. Cube Duisburg, (Rhineland) Pulverweg 41

Thank you for the letter and the picture When you arrive in Cologne, visit the parents of my pupil from Cologne, who is in his third year of study with me: Dr Albersheim, a senior health official. They will certainly be delighted to greet a colleague of their son at their home. You should likewise track down the conductor Felix Hupka at the opera house; he also studied with me. Best greetings from me and my wife.
In mid-October, Vrieslander is coming to Vienna to see Hoboken.
[along the left side:] Send [my] greetings to Mr. and Mrs. Albersheim. [plus one illegible line]
